meanings.definition: Amounting to several billion in number or value.
meanings.sent1: The company made a multibillion investment in new technology.
meanings.sent2: The multibillion project aims to improve infrastructure across the country.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a multibillion ice cream cone sounds delicious!
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like a multibillion watt bulb.
meanings.sent5: The multibillion stars in the night sky sparkled beautifully.

meanings.definition: A sum of several billion dollars.
meanings.sent1: The government allocated a multibillion budget for healthcare.
meanings.sent2: The multibillion acquisition of the company caused a stir in the market.
meanings.sent3: I wish I had a multibillion piggy bank hidden somewhere!
meanings.sent4: His debt felt like a multibillion weight on his shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was filled with multibillion gold coins.
